name: h3
description: The Louisville Slugger D235 Maple Wood Baseball Bat is expertly crafted for players seeking a balanced swing feel and exceptional contact hitting. Featuring the Turn Model 234, this bat boasts a sleek stain and black colorway that stands out on the field. Its huge sweet spot and medium barrel are designed for precision and power, while the flared knob and medium handle offer enhanced grip and control. Engineered for pro-grade durability, the bat is Ink Dot Certified, pro-hardened, and treated with UV light to ensure a harder, denser surface and an improved weight distribution, thanks to its cupped barrel end.
